message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $95 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you won't find a better offer elsewhere.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort, but I still believe there might be a better deal out there for me. I am willing to pay $98 for the product.

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $102. It's a fair price, considering the value you'll get from it. I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I am willing to pay $100 for the product.
